com.esplibrary.packets

Class InfDisplayData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esplibrary.packets.ESPPacket
      • com.esplibrary.packets.InfDisplayData

  • public class InfDisplayData
extends ESPPacket
    Created by JDavis on 3/13/2016. InfDisplayData packet represents the all of the necessary information needed to rebuild the Valentine One's front display. The data includes: the bogey counter 7 segment image 1 & image 2, the signal strength bar graph image, band and arrow indicator image 1 & 2, as well as three aux bytes.

    • Field Detail

      • V1MODE_UNKNOWN

        public static final byte V1MODE_UNKNOWN
        Invalid V1 mode
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • V1MODE_ALL_BOGEY_OR_K_AND_KA

        public static final byte V1MODE_ALL_BOGEY_OR_K_AND_KA
        'All Bogey Mode' if V1 in USA mode. 'U' mode or 'C' Mode if V1 in Euro Mode.
          Usa Operation (Default):
        • All Bogeys Mode
          European Operation:
        • 'U' Mode - K and Ka(Photo)
        • 'C' Mode - K and Custom Sweeps
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • V1MODE_LOGIC_OR_KA

        public static final byte V1MODE_LOGIC_OR_KA
        'Logic' Mode if V1 in USA mode. 'u' mode or 'c' Mode if V1 in Euro Mode.
          Usa Operation (Default): *
        • Logic Mode *
        * *
          European Operation: *
        • 'u' Mode - K and Ka(Photo) *
        • 'c' Mode - K and Custom Sweeps *
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • V1MODE_ADVANCED_LOGIC

        public static final byte V1MODE_ADVANCED_LOGIC
        'Advanced Logic' Mode. Invalid in Euro Mode.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Returns:
        Returns true if the laser bit and the system status bit is set otherwise, returns false.

      • getMode

        public V1Mode getMode()
        Attempts to return the V1 mode stored in the display data Bogey Counter data. If the V1 is alerting mode detection isn't possible because the Bogey Counter bytes indicate the number of detected alerts.
        Returns:
        V1 Mode; V1Mode.Unknown if mode cannot be determined.

      • getBargraphIndicator

        public boolean getBargraphIndicator(int indicatorIndex)
        Returns whether or not the Bar Graph indicator at indicatorIndex is lit.
        Parameters:
        indicatorIndex - The index of the Bar Graph indicator on the V1 is lit.
        Returns:
        True if the indicator at indicatorIndex is lit otherwise, returns false.

      • getNumberOfLEDS

        public int getNumberOfLEDS()
        Returns the number of LEDS lit on the V1 display.
        Returns:
        The number of lit LEDs on the V1 BarGraph display.

      • convertToStringImage1

        public java.lang.String convertToStringImage1()
        Returns the String representation of the seven segment image 1.
        Returns:
        A String representation that a Seven Segment is capable of displaying.
